name: Grass Cutter
overview: Grass Cutter is a game about cutting mutating lawns, that requires lightning-speed response and great logical thinking. Here, every level is a challenging puzzle. The goal is to cut the grass. Very simple, but only at first glance… Grass Cutter calls for focus and commitment. Just one blink of an eye – and you lose. It is very challenging! The game is made in a cubic retro-style, has high complexity at advanced levels and is ready to truly test your reaction! Main Features: • Feel yourself in the shoes of a lawnmower who saves the world of people • More than 10 types of lawn mutations that give you a real challenge • A lot of obstacles. Bypass the security system and laser fences, escape the fire of security guns • You don't want ordinary lawn mowers? You can play with animals. There are many animals in the game: from cows and sheep to beautiful fairy unicorns
